headline: The Serverlist: Benchmarks, Workers.dev, security implications of serverless, and more
keywords: The Serverlist Newsletter, Developers, Cloudflare Workers, Cloudflare Workers KV, Serverless
description: Check out our third edition of The Serverlist below. Get the latest scoop on the serverless space, get your hands dirty with new developer tutorials, engage in conversations with other serverless developers, and find upcoming meetups and conferences to attend.
